IoT site model
API Version: 2020-08-06-preview.

{{% examples %}}
## Example Usage

{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}
### Create or update IoT site
{{% example csharp %}}
```csharp
using Pulumi;
using AzureNative = Pulumi.AzureNative;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var iotSite = new AzureNative.Security.IotSite("iotSite", new AzureNative.Security.IotSiteArgs
        {
            DisplayName = "IoT site name",
            Scope = "subscriptions/20ff7fc3-e762-44dd-bd96-b71116dcdc23/resourceGroups/myRg/providers/Microsoft.Devices/IotHubs/myHub",
            Tags = 
            {
                { "key1", "value1" },
                { "key2", "value2" },
            },
        });
    }

}

```

{{% /example %}}

{{% example go %}}

```go
package main

import (
	security "github.com/pulumi/pulumi-azure-native/sdk/go/azure/security"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v2/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := security.NewIotSite(ctx, "iotSite", &security.IotSiteArgs{
			DisplayName: pulumi.String("IoT site name"),
			Scope:       pulumi.String("subscriptions/20ff7fc3-e762-44dd-bd96-b71116dcdc23/resourceGroups/myRg/providers/Microsoft.Devices/IotHubs/myHub"),
			Tags: pulumi.StringMap{
				"key1": pulumi.String("value1"),
				"key2": pulumi.String("value2"),
			},
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}

```

{{% /example %}}

import pulumi
import pulumi_azure_native as azure_native

iot_site = azure_native.security.IotSite("iotSite",

import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";

## Import


An existing resource can be imported using its type token, name, and identifier, e.g.

```sh
$ pulumi import azure-native:security:IotSite default subscriptions/20ff7fc3-e762-44dd-bd96-b71116dcdc23/resourceGroups/myRg/providers/Microsoft.Devices/IotHubs/myHub/providers/Microsoft.Security/iotSites/default 
```
